title: deferred closure fails to move variable to heap
body:
by **consalus**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
 1. Run the attached program.
 2. The version that defers an anonymous closure gives a different output than the version that defers a named closure.


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

OS X 10.5.8

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

d5785050f61d (release-branch.r59) release/release.r59

Please provide any additional information below.

This code runs as expected on golang.org.
I don't know of any recent language changes that would account for this behavior.
Attachments: 1. samplecase.go (356 bytes)
